metadata.name: Waiting
metadata.description:
She is waiting for someone who has promised her something. What is it? Does she trust them? Has she been here before? Have you? This work is about women who place their faith in others to love, protect, nurture and care for them. In some countries women are honoured. In others, less so.


*The artist grants to the owner of this NFT, full commercial rights to exploit the image for their own commercial purposes, for the period as long as they hold this NFT in their digital wallet.
